amendment.description: To clarify the criteria to be considered in determining eligibility for Millennium Challenge assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2012 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2012 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S13367; text: CR S13367) To clarify the criteria to be considered in determining eligibility for Millennium Challenge assistance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2012 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2012 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Harkin.
